languages.text:
On Attack of Opportunity hit target gains Immobilized for 1 round.
Base Armour Property: Deflection +3 if wielders STR more than 70

traits.locale_text:
On Attack of Opportunity hit target gains Immobilized for 1 round.
Base Armour Property: Deflection +3 if wielders STR more than 70

languages.text: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.
languages.original_text: Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g} персонажа, становятся {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженными{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +3 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} больше 70.

traits.locale_text: The targets hit by the wielder's attacks of opportunity become immobilised for 1 round. Base armour property: +3 deflection if the wielder's Strength is more than 70.

The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's Strength is more than 70.

The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's Strength is more than 70.

The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's Strength is more than 70.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarının{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Taban zırh özelliği: Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliği 70'ten yüksekse +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}.
languages.original_text: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarının{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Taban zırh özelliği: Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliği 70'ten yüksekse +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}.

Kullanan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarının{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} hedefler {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer. Taban zırh özelliği: Kullanan kişinin Kuvvet niteliği 70'ten yüksekse +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g}.

languages.text: Los objetivos que reciben {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} por los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} del portador quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Propiedad básica de armadura: +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del portador es superior a 70.
languages.original_text: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos que reciben {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} por los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} del portador quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Propiedad básica de armadura: +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la Fuerza del portador es superior a 70.

Los objetivos que reciben {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} por los {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} del portador quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g} durante 1 asalto. Propiedad básica de armadura: +3 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} si la Fuerza del portador es superior a 70.

languages.text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，被命中的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}高于70，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，被命中的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的力量高于70，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，被命中的敌人会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，持续一轮。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的力量高于70，获得+3{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de l'utilisateur sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Propriété d'armure de base : +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} si l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Endurance{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.
languages.original_text: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de l'utilisateur sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} pendant 1 round. Propriété d'armure de base : +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} si l'Endurance de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de l'utilisateur sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} pendant 1 round. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} si la Force de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de l'utilisateur sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} pendant 1 round. Propriété d'armure de base : +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} si l'Endurance de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de l'utilisateur sont {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g} pendant 1 round. Propriété d'armure de base : +3 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} si l'Endurance de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}受けた{/g}ターゲットは、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が70を超える場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}+3。
languages.original_text: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の機会攻撃を受けたターゲットは、1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の腕力が70を超える場合、ディフレクション+3。
使用者の機会攻撃を受けたターゲットは、1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の腕力が70を超える場合、ディフレクション+3。
使用者の機会攻撃を受けたターゲットは、1ラウンドの間移動不可になる。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の腕力が70を超える場合、ディフレクション+3。

languages.text: Ein von den {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffenes{/g} Ziel ist 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g}, wenn der Träger mehr als 70 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} hat.

languages.text: Цели, получившие {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g} персонажа, становятся {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженными{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
